episodes.description: This episode focuses on the Tokyo  International Film Festival. We look at  "HOKUSAI", a biopic on Katsushika Hokusai, the Japanese artists that's had much influence on the international art world.
episodes.subtitle: Close-up on Tokyo International Film Festival
episodes.title: J-FLICKS

episodes.description: On this episode, we focus on one of the grandmasters of classic Japanese cinema, world-renowned filmmaker Ozu Yasujiro. We look at his earlier films: "There Was a Father" and "Dragnet Girl."
episodes.subtitle: How to Watch Ozu
episodes.title: J-FLICKS
